title: Days of Infamy: Macarthur, Roosevelt, Churchill-The Shocking Truth Revealed: How Their Secret Deals & Strategic Blunders Caused Disasters at Pearl Harbor & the Philippines
description: Reveals the strategic errors, diplomatic bungling, and military cover-ups that surrounded the failure of MacArthur, Roosevelt, and Churchill to avert the bombing of Pearl Harbor. Reprint.
author: John Edmond Costello
